thread.title: Saints kicker Zach Hocker gets the boot
thread.title_full: Saints kicker Zach Hocker gets the boot

author: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Saints kicker Zach Hocker gets the boot
text:
Saints kicker Zach Hocker gets the boot Updated: Zach Hocker has been released by the Saints. (Photo by David Grunfeld, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune) METAIRIE, LA (WVUE) - 
The Saints have released kicker Zach Hocker, a source said. 
Hocker missed four of his 13 field goal attempts and one extra point attempt. He was one for three on field goal attempts during Thursday's game against the Atlanta Falcons. 
The Saints quickly picked up Kai Forbath, according to a team source. 
Forbath was released by the Washington Redskins after Week 1. 
Copyright 2015 WVUE . All rights reserved. Zach Hocker has been released by the Saints. (Photo by David Grunfeld, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune) The Saints have released kicker Zach Hocker.
